eu.linksmart.policy.pep
Class PepResponse

java.lang.Object
  eu.linksmart.policy.pep.PepResponse

public class PepResponse
extends java.lang.Object

PEP response value object class for access decisions, details of incomplete request, details of request failure

Author:
Michael Crouch, Marco Tiemann
